Run a design one time

Source: R/design_helper_functions.R
run_design.Rd

Run a design one time

run_design(design)

Arguments

design

a DeclareDesign object

Examples

design <-
  declare_population(N = 100, X = rnorm(N)) +
  declare_potential_outcomes(Y ~ (.25 + X) * Z + rnorm(N)) +
  declare_assignment(m = 50) +
  declare_estimand(ATE = mean(Y_Z_1 - Y_Z_0)) +
  declare_estimator(Y ~ Z, estimand = "ATE")

run_design(design)

#>   estimand_label  estimand estimator_label term estimate std.error statistic
#> 1            ATE 0.3423254       estimator    Z 0.326886 0.2447019  1.335854
#>     p.value  conf.low conf.high       df outcome
#> 1 0.1852983 -0.159915  0.813687 81.87667       Y
